p: Menthol ((1 R,2 S,5 R)-2-isopropyl-5-methylcyclohexanol) ( Figure 7) is a cyclic monoterpene found as the major constituent in the essential oils of Mentha canadensis L. (mint) and M. x piperita L. (peppermint) [ 80]. It has pharmacological activities known as an analgesic [ 81], an effect on bladder hyperactivity and cystitis [ 82] and as an antioxidant [ 83].
